name: Diversified Healthcare Trust
description: Diversified Healthcare Trust (DHC) is a real estate investment trust (REIT) specializing in healthcare properties. Founded in 2004, DHC is committed to acquiring, owning, and managing a diversified portfolio of healthcare-related real estate, primarily focusing on senior living communities and healthcare facilities. The company aims to provide quality healthcare services by partnering with leading operators in the healthcare industry. DHC's portfolio includes properties leased to tenants in the healthcare sector, such as skilled nursing facilities, assisted living communities, and medical office buildings. With a strategic focus on high-quality, income-generating assets in the healthcare sector, DHC seeks to deliver long-term value to its shareholders while meeting the growing demand for healthcare services driven by an aging population. The company is also dedicated to sustainability and improving the operational efficiency of its properties, aligning with health and environmental best practices. As a publicly traded REIT, DHC is listed on the Nasdaq under the ticker symbol DEA and regularly engages with investors to provide transparency and updates on its portfolio performance and strategic initiatives.

seo.meta_title: Diversified Healthcare Trust | Real Estate Investment Trust
seo.meta_description: Explore Diversified Healthcare Trust, a leading REIT focused on healthcare properties. Learn about our mission, portfolio, and commitment to quality healthcare.

faq.question: What is Diversified Healthcare Trust?
faq.answer: Diversified Healthcare Trust is a real estate investment trust that focuses on healthcare-related properties.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Diversified Healthcare Trust?
faq.answer: Jennifer Francis is the CEO of Diversified Healthcare Trust.

faq.question: Where is Diversified Healthcare Trust headquartered?
faq.answer: Diversified Healthcare Trust is headquartered in Newton, Massachusetts, USA.

faq.question: What types of properties does Diversified Healthcare Trust own?
faq.answer: DHC owns senior living communities, skilled nursing facilities, and medical office buildings.

faq.question: When was Diversified Healthcare Trust founded?
faq.answer: Diversified Healthcare Trust was founded in 2004.
